alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 3:43AM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches above 7,000 ft, 3 to 8 inches 5,000 to 7,000 ft and 1 to 3 inches 3,500 ft to 5,000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...High winds will begin this afternoon and continue through tonight. Snow will begin this evening and continue into Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
